wraps.moon

TextureWrap = yae.java.require "com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Texture$TextureWrap"

{
  "mirroredrepeat": TextureWrap.MirroredRepeat
  "clamp": TextureWrap.ClampToEdge

}
